title: Notice
content:
wffweb-3.0.9 is released, upgrade your project now. Say good bye to anonymous style coding. Now you can use functional style coding instead of anonymous style coding.
Latest will deliver better performance for UI updates because in wffweb-3.0.6 internal algorithm for generating UI data for updating client (browser page) is upgraded. Visit webfirmframework.com/demo for experience. Please know that your donations make this framework alive. If your company would like to become a sponsor or if you prefer to donate using other platforms, please contact tech-support@webfirmframework.com. Sponsors will be provided invoice for their accounting purpose and their company logo with link will be published in this website and github website.
